name: Hemlock Grove (Season 1)
summary:
该系列剧基于Brian McGreevy的同名恐怖小说改编。 

       宾夕法尼亚州的一个钢铁小镇上，一名年轻的女孩的尸体被发现抛弃在戈德弗雷家族的炼钢厂附近，由于警方迟迟不能破案，而17岁的吉普赛问题少年彼得·鲁曼切克和戈德弗雷家族，奥莉薇·戈德弗雷（法米克·詹森 Famke Janssen 饰）的儿子罗曼·戈德弗雷（比尔·斯卡斯加德 Bill Skarsgård 饰）也成为嫌疑人。为了洗清嫌疑，彼得和罗曼两人决定一同去调查，但是他们很快就发现了惊讶的事情...... 

       凶手到底是谁？这个普通的钢铁小镇到底隐藏着怎样的秘密？

      （简介转自人人影视）

eps.name: Jellyfish in the Sky
eps.desc:
The mysterious death of a young cheerleader, Brooke Bluebell, baffles the quiet town of Hemlock Grove. Police suspect an animal attack but no tracks are found. The Godfreys are the wealthy tycoon family of Hemlock Grove. Olivia Godfrey has controlled the Godfrey empire since the death of her husband, JR. Roman Godfrey has a blood fetish, and his sister Shelley is a deformed giant. Earlier in the summer, gypsies, Peter Rumancek and his mother Lynda move into a recently inherited trailer home. People in town are suspicious that Peter killed Brooke based on rumors that he is a werewolf.
After a vigil for Brooke, Peter visits the scene of Brooke's death where Roman appears and accuses him of killing her.

eps.name: The Angel
eps.desc: Roman's cousin, Letha, is pregnant and is convinced she has immaculately conceived after a visit from an angel. Shelley writes an email to her uncle Norman explaining how she has begun to stand up to her mother, Olivia. Norman accuses Olivia and Dr. Pryce of getting his daughter pregnant, which she denies. They later have sex. Peter and Roman become friends and discuss the ouroboros they both have dreams of. Roman becomes convinces that Peter is a werewolf. Roman escorts his cousin Letha to a Halloween dance. On their way home, they meet a deranged man lying down in the middle of the road. Upon Roman's request, Peter transforms into a werewolf as Roman watches.

eps.name: The Order of the Dragon
eps.desc: Another dead body turns up with more unanswered questions. The local sheriff calls in Dr. Chausser, a special agent for a federal agency that oversees wild life. Roman confesses to Peter that they both share the same dreams. Roman tells him that he wanted to be a part of the Order of the Dragon and confesses to Peter that he experiences premonitions. Peter later tells his cousin that he believes Roman is an Upir, but that he doesn't know it yet. Both Peter and Roman suspect that the killer is a Vargwolf, a werewolf that has gone insane. Francis, the deranged man Roman and Letha met on their way home, explains to Norman that he has premonitions and has seen the "thing" growing inside Letha.

eps.name: In Poor Taste
eps.desc: Roman and Peter team up to discover the identity of the killer. They dig up the girl's buried body to look for clues. Meanwhile, Olivia is running out of the liquid she drops into her eyes and it is revealed that Peter's uncle Vince was Olivia's dealer. Now, however, Peter's mother Lynda is in possession of Vince's stash. As addicted as Olivia is, she can't seem to bring herself to ask Lynda for another vial, but signs of withdrawal are becoming evident. Dr. Pryce shows Shelley a mysterious orchid he's developing. Meanwhile, Olivia plots to gain possession of Letha's baby after it's born. Dr. Chausser and the Sheriff find a hair sample that leads them to believe the killer is male. The young novelist, Christina, is haunted by her discovery of the dead body.

eps.name: Hello, Handsome
eps.desc:
We learn more about Dr. Chausser's past, including her involvement in the U.S. Marine Corps. Trapped alone with a pregnant woman in a jail cell for 3.5 weeks, it's eventually revealed that the woman is a werewolf. The Order of the Dragon has placed Chausser in the cell as a rite of passage. Once she kills the woman, she's permitted to enter the order.
Peter's cousin helps him understand more about the murders by channeling the spirit of the most recent victim. She warns Peter to stay away from Roman.
While engaging in intercourse with a woman, Roman purposely cuts a large gash across his chest. She leaves in hysterics.
Francis, the madman, has told Norman that Dr. Pryce has killed him and brought him back to life. Norman is beginning to believe that Francis is telling the truth.

eps.name: The Crucible
eps.desc:
Peter and Roman follow the trail of Lisa Willoughby's murderer back to an abandoned steel mill owned by Roman's family. Roman accuses Peter of getting his cousin Letha pregnant, creating a rift between the two boys. While investigating at the mill, the police arrive upon suspicion of trespassers. Roman is so angry at Peter that he allows himself to be taken into police custody while Peter hides elsewhere in the mill. After Roman is arrested, Peter realizes that he is stranded at the mill because Roman is the one who drove the two of them out there.
Christine goes out on a date with Tyler, but the memory of discovering Lisa Willoughby's dead body continues to haunt her. While the two of them are kissing, Christine has a breakdown and claws at Tyler's eyes and face.
Olivia's health continues to deteriorate. Dr. Pryce informs Norman that a mysterious company called Lod, LLC has offered to buy all of his shares, removing him from the company. Norman suspects that Olivia is behind the buyout.

eps.name: Measure of Disorder
eps.desc:
The rift between Peter and Roman widens when Letha begins to fall in love with Peter. When Roman discovers this, he is driven mad with rage. He drives to the home of a female schoolmate, Ashley Valentine, and rapes her. When he's finished, he uses his mind control powers to make her forget that he'd come to her house and forced her to "dream of something pleasant." There is a strong suggestion that this is exactly what happened to Letha.
We also learn that after JR died, Norman was planning to leave his wife for Olivia, but that he elected not to do so after he discovered that his wife was pregnant with Letha.
Olivia strikes a deal with Lynda to pay $5,000 per vial of the substance to which Olivia is addicted.

eps.name: Catabasis
eps.desc: After drunkenly attacking the Godfrey Institute, Roman falls into a coma and embarks on a subconscious journey of shocking truths and revelations.

eps.name: What Peter Can Live Without
eps.desc: As a full moon approaches, Letha's parents discover her relationship with Peter. Despite a crisis of faith, Chasseur prepares to capture the killer.

eps.name: What God Wants
eps.desc: A weakened Roman emerges from his coma and reunites with Peter to stop the killer. Hemlock Grove braces itself for another lethal full moon.

eps.name: The Price
eps.desc: Peter and his mother hide from vigilantes seeking the killer, while Christina disappears, and Roman finally begins to face the truth about his nature.

eps.name: Children of the Night
eps.desc: As Olivia and Chasseur face off at the Mill, Shelley learns the awful truth about her family, and Peter and Roman uncover the killer's identity.

eps.name: Birth
eps.desc: The tragic conclusion the Hemlock Grove killing spree leaves both the Godfrey and Rumancek families devastated, with the final horror yet to come.
